Package com.atakmap.map.layer.opengl

      • Methods inherited from interface com.atakmap.map.layer.opengl.GLLayer

      • Methods inherited from interface com.atakmap.map.opengl.GLMapRenderable

        draw, release

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Transitions the layer renderer into the Started state. The renderer may only access its subject while in the Started state.

        This method may be invoked from any thread, however, it may never be called concurrently with stop().

      • stop

        void stop()
        Transitions the layer renderer into the Stopped state. The renderer may not access its subject until returning to the Started state, however, any renderable content previously derived may continue to be rendered.

        This method may be invoked from any thread, however, it may never be called concurrently with start().
